TEXT.S:
bihkac
u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulamu sulit nu Lipun
u sulit nu Amilka Animal trapping, or simply trapping
u siwkay nu bihkac- sakapaluwaluway u bihkac sa ,u sapiadup tu aadupen nu miadupay. sangaen nu muking, tusa ku sicekaay, buhatay ku sicekay patizeng i zazan nu aadupen. anu mazipa ku aadupen sa, amatahap ku sicekaay, mahiza ku ngipen, makalad, makelem nu bihkac. mazikeptu ku aadupan a kuku'. saicelang ku bihekac. pacekan i lala sanay, caykalimad.
u canan a aadupen ku mazikep uyniay a bihkac, maala ku caket sizikiyumangabul, caykaala ku tumay, tatabaki ku tumay.
u canan a cidekay matineng misanga atu miadup u miadupay a ingcumin, matinengtu sapibihekac, matinengtu misanga. ayzasa caytu misanga ku miadupay, cakayhan i tishiba, izawtu ku pacakayay.
u zuma a bihkac nu Sakizaya izawtu ku sapitekelay a bihekac, caykaw nu mukingay a bihkac, u auk atu kilang. caykaw icelang ku ayam atu tulakuk, u auk atu kilangay a bihkac, tanengtu mazikep tu ayam atu tulakuk.
